It combines an LLM-based generator with a Control Flow Analyzer to ensure syntactic and structural correctness, then uses SandTable for trace validation. Demonstrated on etcd‚Äôs Raft (Go) and Asterinas‚Äôs SpinLock (Rust), Specula offers a reproducible path toward scaling automated specification to broader codebases and abstracting algorithmic intent.
